name: S.H.I.P.
text: It looks like you managed quite the haul!

name: S.H.I.P.
text: I'd say even enough for some upgrades to the ship.

name: S.H.I.P.
text: There is a shop nearby... we should see what they have available.

name: S.H.I.P.
text: I have set the destination... we will arrive shortly.
